abstract: Season 2 Eps. 1-5 (Each episode runs for 23 mins.) Ep. 1 Something new--Ep. 2 It's an art--Ep. 3 Free stuff--Ep. 4 Solidarity--Ep. 5 Games people play
description: Episode of Series "Crash zone". Episode 1: The second season of the series opens with Catalyst on the brink of financial ruin. The kids find an electronic solution to the company's woes. Episode 2. An inventor brings radical 3-D classes to Catalyst and Alex and the team must select the perfect game for showcasing them to the world. Episode 3: The lure of a program that can order all the free stuff from the Net automatically inspires Marcello's latest brainwave. Episode 4: The kids are torn between their principles and their allegiance to Alex when they go on strike for better conditions. Episode 5: Mike becomes drawn in to a violent game on the Net after he breaks up with Pi. Things get out of hand when 'Damon', an evil character from the game follows Mike into the real world. Cast includes Paul Pantano, Cassandra Magrath, Nikolai Nikolaeff, Frances Wang, Damien Bodie, Nicki Wendt and Matthew Parkinson. Teaching resources can be found at: http://www.actf.com.au/learning_centre_new/Learning_frameset.htm Accompanying website at: www.crashzone.tv
